meanings.sent1: The cockup in the kitchen was a disaster.
meanings.sent2: She always manages to create a cockup when baking cookies.
meanings.sent3: The cockup with the birthday cake made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: His attempt at a surprise party turned into a real cockup.
meanings.sent5: The cockup in the presentation was unforgettable.

meanings.definition: To make a mess or mistake.
meanings.sent1: Please don't cockup the schedule for the event.
meanings.sent2: I tend to cockup simple tasks when I'm nervous.
meanings.sent3: He managed to cockup the paint job on the wall.
meanings.sent4: She always finds a way to cockup her relationships.
meanings.sent5: Try not to cockup the important meeting tomorrow.
